title: Bug 7487Classpath variable edit error message wrong
description: Bug 7487Classpath variable edit error message wrong Using build 20020109 on Windows 2000From the prefrerence dialog, I opened the page JavaClasspath Variables.
OB: The content came up asECLIPSEHOMED:/eclipsesdk/20011204/eclipseI started editing the path by removing the 20011204 sectionD:/eclipsesdk//eclipseAt that point I got the following red error message at the bottom of the dialog!VariableCreationDialogerror.invalidpath!
SR: Iselected the ECLIPSEHOME variable and pressed Edit. The content came up asECLIPSEHOMED:/eclipsesdk/20011204/eclipseI started editing the path by removing the 20011204 sectionD:/eclipsesdk//eclipseAt that point I got the following red error message at the bottom of the dialog!VariableCreationDialogerror.invalidpath!
